name: YouTube Captions
description: YouTube Captions, Transcript, Subtitles - Download captions in SRT, VTT, XML, JSON formats, translate to any language

best_practices.language: Start with 'en' (English). Most videos have English subtitles. Only call /language-list if 'en' returns 404.
best_practices.response_mode: Use response_mode=url for faster response and less bandwidth. The API returns a URL to fetch the actual data.
best_practices.retry: API can be slow or timeout. Implement 1-2 retries with exponential backoff.
best_practices.parallel: For multiple videos, fetch transcripts in parallel using async/parallel requests.

error_handling.404: Video not found or subtitles not available. Try a different language or check if video exists.

video_info.description: Get detailed video information (title, description, author, views, keywords, thumbnails, etc.)

response_mode.description: Set to 'url' to get a link to the response instead of the response itself (saves bandwidth)
